name: scheduled_deactivation_of_suspended_okta_users_aft
title: Scheduled Deactivation of Suspended Okta Users (after X Days)
description: This Okta Workflows solution automates the process of deactivating Okta users who have remained in a *SUSPENDED* status for a specified number of days. This helps enforce user lifecycle policies by ensuring that users suspended for an extended period are moved to a deactivated state.
